page.title: 17Tockwith Clubs and Societies
page.content: There are a wide variety of social and recreational clubs in Tockwith, catering for all age groups. The tennis club is held on the Sports Field Trust Grounds. Yearly there is a meeting when the committee, which is responsible for club rules and the maintenance of the tennis court, is elected. In 1985 there were 80 members. It is Â£2.50 for children up to 16, Â£5.00 for adults and Â£12.50 for family memberships. Children under 14 have to be supervised and can play until 7.30pm. It is not necessary to book a court, but a half hour courtesy has to be obeyed. Regulation clothes of white T-shirt and shorts or skirt, and smooth soled tennis shoes must be worn. Members who do not obey the rules can be suspended.
